meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be localized.
meanings.sent1: The localizabilities of the lost keys made it easy to find them.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the localizabilities of different species in their natural habitats.
meanings.sent3: The detective's superpower was his incredible localizabilities when solving mysteries.
meanings.sent4: Her localizabilities in navigating the city were unmatched, like a human GPS.
meanings.sent5: The localizabilities of the wifi signal were weak in the basement.

meanings.definition: The ability to be pinpointed or identified in a specific location.
meanings.sent1: The localizabilities of the treasure on the map led to a thrilling adventure.
meanings.sent2: The localizabilities of the suspect at the crime scene helped solve the case.
meanings.sent3: The localizabilities of the cat in the house always seemed to defy logic.
meanings.sent4: The localizabilities of the stars in the night sky guided the lost travelers.
meanings.sent5: The localizabilities of the secret door in the old mansion remained hidden for years.
